participant_1.background:
I am a clumsy person who likes to read pet training blogs and websites.
i like to skate.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.
i worked as a clown in the circus.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy riding horses, but I need to be more mindful of my surroundings when I do so.
I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park.
i love all sorts of fresh vegetables.
i hate to lose.
i have one little boy named owen.

content.text: Hello there! My name is John.
What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy riding horses, but I should be more mindful of my surroundings.
That sounds like it could be fun! I used to be a clown in the circus.
Really? That's cool. Do you have any funny stories?
I do have quite a few, but I think my favorite one is about the time I had to make a balloon animal for a child who was afraid of clowns.
Oh no! That must have been difficult.
It was a little bit, but I managed to make a balloon dog that he really liked.
That's great! I'm glad you could make him happy.
Thanks, me too! What else do you like to do?
I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park. He loves to run around and play with the other dogs.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love dogs.
They're the best! Do you have any pets?
No, I don't. I really want a dog, but I don't have the time to take care of one right now.
That's too bad. I'm sure you'd be a great pet owner.
Thanks! Maybe one day I'll have a dog of my own
